Options:
A. Glass shoots Superintendent Washburn
B. Tramell points a gun at Glass
C. Tramell visits Glass in a mental hospital
D. Glass is institutionalized
Correct Answer: Glass shoots Superintendent Washburn, Tramell visits Glass in a mental hospital
